name: Thirteen (itch) (KilaWolfsblut, NetteNetti, MaxiMelone, Super_Simon)
description:
Long ago - just over 2 years - the meme nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Voss nation attacked. Only you, the Memebender, the master of all meme elements, could stop them.

When the world needed you most, you appeared. Now save the memes from their destiny and shoot that like cannon like a boss!
